articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Storm Boris casualties rise as floods ravage Central Europe - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Death toll due to devastating flooding reaches at least 19 as many areas brace for more rain.
articles.content:
At least 19 people are reported to have died in flooding caused by Storm Boris in Central and Eastern Europe, with many countries braced for more torrential rain.
